tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    materials VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE logistics (
    logistics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    transportation_method VARCHAR(255),
    transportation_date DATE,
    installation_team VARCHAR(255),
    installation_status VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Sculptures (
    sculpture_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name TEXT,
    artist_name TEXT,
    material TEXT,
    height FLOAT,
    width FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE InstallationLogistics (
    logistics_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id UUID,
    installation_date DATE,
    installation_location TEXT,
    installation_team TEXT,
    cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Transportation (
    transportation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id UUID,
    transportation_date DATE,
    transportation_method TEXT,
    destination TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name TEXT,
    artist_name TEXT,
    material TEXT,
    height FLOAT,
    width FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE installations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    installation_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    installation_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    sculpture_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES sculptures(id)
);

CREATE TABLE transportation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transportation_mode TEXT,
    departure_date DATE,
    arrival_date DATE,
    cost FLOAT,
    sculpture_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES sculptures(id)
);

CREATE TABLE logistics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    event_location TEXT,
    sculpture_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES sculptures(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sculpture (
  sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sculpture_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  installation_date DATE,
  material VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE InstallationSite (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  site_size VARCHAR(50),
  site_accessible BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE TransportationCompany (
  company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact_email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE TransportManifest (
  manifest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sculpture_id INT REFERENCES Sculpture(sculpture_id),
  transport_company_id INT REFERENCES TransportationCompany(company_id),
  transport_date DATE,
  arrival_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE InstallationLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sculpture_id INT REFERENCES Sculpture(sculpture_id),
  site_id INT REFERENCES InstallationSite(site_id),
  installation_date DATE,
  installation_notes TEXT
)
